full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'DIR YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENGGE GDONG PA CAN GYI SGO NAS BZLOG PA BYA BA'I TSUL NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B (ZHES MKHA' 'GRO MA SENGGE GDONG PA CAN GYI BZLOG BSGYUR 'DI YANG DPAL LDAN BLA MA DAM PA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS DPAL BZANG PO'I ZHABS PAD BRTAN PA'I TIM HOR NGAG 'DON DU BYA BA'I PHYIR DU BKA' 'GYUR PA TSUL KHRIMS MING CAN GYIS LHAN THABS SU BSGRIGS PA'O,, ,,)
